H0.text: Recently appointed, what is the name of the current manager of Southampton Football Club . Ralph Hasenhüttl

H1.text: Recently appointed, what is the name of the current manager of Southampton Football Club . Nathan Jones

H2.text: Recently appointed, what is the name of the current manager of Southampton Football Club . Steven Gerrard

H3.text: Recently appointed, what is the name of the current manager of Southampton Football Club . Pochettino

A4.text: In November 2022, it was announced Southampton had part company with manager Ralph Hasenhüttl after four years, to be replaced by Nathan Jones.

A5.text: On 12 February 2023, Jones was sacked following a disappointing run of results during which the Saints lost seven out of eight league matches, leaving them bottom of the Premier League table.

A6.text: Hasenhüttl was appointed as the new manager of Southampton in December 2018.

A7.text: He succeeded Mark Hughes as Southampton's manager in December 2018.
